hero.title: About Company
hero.description: UNICOVER LLP is a multi-profile engineering and design-construction company providing a full range of services in industrial safety, surveys, design and construction.

about.title: Our Activities
about.paragraph1: UNICOVER LLP specializes in performing the full cycle of works from engineering surveys to commissioning. We work in various industries and civil construction.
about.paragraph2: The company has all necessary licenses and certificates confirming the right to perform work in the field of surveys, design and construction. Our specialists have extensive experience working with facilities of various complexity.
about.paragraph3: We guarantee high quality of work performed, compliance with all regulatory requirements and standards of the Republic of Kazakhstan, as well as an individual approach to each project.

vacancies.title: Vacancies

vacancies.noVacancies: There are currently no open vacancies

info.title: Didn't find a suitable vacancy?
info.description: Send us your resume, and we will contact you when a suitable position becomes available.

support.title: Support
support.description: Contact us if you have any questions

faq1.question: How to start learning?
faq1.answer: Go to "My Courses" section and select a course to start learning. After the administrator assigns a course, it will appear in your personal cabinet.

faq2.question: How to take a test?
faq2.answer: Select an available test in the "Tests" section and click "Start Testing". You have a limited number of attempts to pass the test.

faq3.question: Where to get a certificate?
faq3.answer: After successfully completing the course and passing the exam, the certificate will be available in the "Documents" section of your personal cabinet.

faq4.question: What to do if technical problems occur?
faq4.answer: Contact our support service by phone or email listed above. We will help solve the problems that have arisen.
